import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.54ede7fd:
df4=df.groupby(['Year','Genre']).size().reset_index(name="Count")
dfFiction=df4[df4['Genre']=='Fiction']
dfNonFiction=df4[df4['Genre']=='Non Fiction']
fic=dfFiction['Count'].tolist()
nonfic=dfNonFiction['Count'].tolist()
year=dfFiction['Year'].tolist()
dfGr=pd.DataFrame({'Fiction': fic,
                   'Non Fiction': nonfic}, index=year)
ax = dfGr.plot.bar()

source.53f5b392: Printing the list of authors and the best sellers that they have produced.
source.0045507c: The books that have received maximum ratings from users, out of which 41 are Fiction and only 11 are non fiction.
source.436f1481: The dataframe has 7 columns and 550 rows.
source.94415c04: The higheset number of best sellers are produced by Dr. Seuss who has produced 8 best sellers who has received highest ratings from users, followed by Dav Pilkey and Eric Carle who have produced 7 best sellers each of higheset ratings.
source.9f4bd4dd: The bar chart above shows the number of books that were fiction vs non fiction among the best sellers over the years. For all the years except 2014, the number of fiction best sellers have been greater than non fiction best sellers.
source.0b493d60: The book 'Where the Crawdads sing' has got maximum user reviews (87841) among the best sellers.
source.4b3719d4: The above data shows average rating of every best selling author
source.4254aa4f: The average rating received on a best selling book is 4.6
source.97a8a9ee: There are 84 books for which price is 0. It may be because of those books being available in electronic format i.e. s ebooks.
source.14547555: The book 'Divine Soul Mind Body Healing and Transmission' has got minimum reviews (37) among the best sellers.
